title: Mickey & company
brief_description: A collection of classic animated films the master animator Walt Disney made between 1936 and 1960. The cartoons feature Disney’s most lovable characters including Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, Pluto and Goofy. The complete program of cartoons includes: “Mickey’s grand opera”, “The Wise little hen”, “Mr. Mouse takes a trip”, “Two weeks vacation”, “Winder dog”, “Morris the midget moose”, and “Dragon around.”
